author: Charles
title: Charles
text: I have been looking all over to replace my Sensa Ball point pen. There is nothing like it anywhere and it was discontinued. Colorado pen was the only one that had a unique pen that can service my needs. I'm an engineer for a large metropolitan city. We still require wet signatures on a number of documents. So a reliable pen that I can carry and use anywhere is as essential for me as a hammer is to a carpenter. Colorado pen had such a device and I'm very pleased with it.
